short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to improve your Nitro Type experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- 👜 Feature rich, with options such as:
	- 🏁 **Custom race banners** (The original purpose of Accelerant)
	- 🎨 Theming
	- ⚡ Tweaks
- 🌸 Integrated cleanly into the UI
- 🔎 Open source (https://github.com/gBasil/accelerant)
